ResourceHeader.ResourceName: THEMIS-A Level 1 Probe Orbital Data from SSC
ResourceHeader.Description: The L1 orbital data file produced by the Satellite Situation Center contains probe position and velocity data as Cartesian data points that are stored at maximum time resolution of one minute in geocentric inertial coordinates.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Satellite Situation Center (SSCWeb) System at NASA GSFC and the THEMIS project at UC Berkeley.

InformationURL.Name: THEMIS Data Overview
InformationURL.Description: Overview of THEMIS data, descriptions, and data policy.

InformationURL.Name: THEMIS Data Policy and Credits
InformationURL.Description: Details on THEMIS data policy and giving proper credits in publications.

InformationURL.Name: THEMIS Ephemeris Format Definition
InformationURL.Description: Ephemeris file format and quantity details including RoI descriptions.

InformationURL.Name: Satellite Situation Center (SSCWeb) System and Services
InformationURL.Description: Orbital elements in time-ordered Cartesian coordinates and geocentric inertial coordinates.
